content:
Citrus-Herb Vinaigrette is a fantastic choice for a light and refreshing salad dressing. It's perfect for a weekday lunch, especially when you're looking for something that won't weigh you down.

You're welcome for the suggestions! I'm glad I could help. If you have any other questions or need further assistance, don't hesitate to ask.

Remember, the beauty of making your own salad dressing is that you can always adjust the flavors to your taste. So, feel free to experiment with different citrus fruits, herbs, and spices to create your own signature vinaigrette.

Enjoy your delicious salad with leftover chicken and Citrus-Herb Vinaigrette!
